sentence.Network_en: The room was so lovely it seemed churlish to argue.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间太漂亮了，要是再争辩的话就会显得很无礼。

sentence.Network_en: She would think him churlish if he refused.
sentence.Network_cn: 他要是拒绝的话，她就会认为他不够友好。

sentence.Network_en: It would be churlish to refuse such a generous offer.
sentence.Network_cn: 拒绝这样一个慷慨的提议未免失礼。

chunking 组块churlish 粗暴的CIA 智力系数

list.exp: 搅动 翻腾 搅奶桶
list.abs: churlishlychurlishness churn 搅动翻腾搅奶桶churn out 大量生产粗制滥造
Frank had his churlish delicacies ., 富兰克有罕见的温情.
childish act 幼稚的举动churlish act 粗暴的举动cogitative act 深思熟虑的举动
but right now such objections seem churlish ., 但是现在这种否决似乎是无礼的.

entry.tran: 不友好的;脾气坏的;粗鲁的
entry.def: Someone who is churlish is unfriendly, bad-tempered, or impolite.

example.ex: She would think him churlish if he refused...
example.tran: 他要是拒绝的话，她就会认为他不够友好。

example.ex: The room was so lovely it seemed churlish to argue.
example.tran: 房间太漂亮了，要是再争辩的话就会显得很无礼。

auth_sentence.content: Ignorance makes them churlish, thwart, and mutinous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ignorance makes them churlish, thwart, and mutinous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ignorance makes them churlish, thwart, and mutinous.

auth_sentence.content: It seemed churlish not to comply with her heartfelt request.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seemed churlish not to comply with her heartfelt request.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seemed churlish not to comply with her heartfelt request.

auth_sentence.content: These are churlish times, and the stakes are high.
auth_sentence.res_content: These are churlish times, and the stakes are high.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These are churlish times, and the stakes are high.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"像……一样,有……的",通常放在具体的名词后; 2. 表动词,"造成……,成……"

stems_affixes.word_buile: slug懒汉+ish像……一样,有……的→sluggish→行动迟钝的,缓慢的
book书+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.书呆子的
boor粗野的人,不懂礼貌的人+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.粗野的
child孩子+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.孩子的;幼稚的
churl粗野的人,吝啬鬼+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.脾气暴躁的
cold冷+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.微冷的
colt小马,无经验的年轻人+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.放浪不拘的,似小马的
fadd时尚+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.流行一时的,时尚的
fat非,胖+ish像……一样,有……的→fattish略胖的
fiend魔鬼+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.极凶恶的
fool愚人,白痴+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.愚笨的,愚蠢的
mode时尚+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.时髦的
self自己+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.自私的
snob势利的人,假内行+ish像……一样,有……的→snobbish势利的,谄上欺下的
wag摇摆,小丑+ish像……一样,有……的→waggish→诙谐的,滑稽的
yellow黄+ish像……一样,有……的→adj.微黄色的
pol擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,擦亮;使优美,润饰 n.擦光剂,上光蜡
di分开+mini小+ish造成……,成……→变小,减少
em进入+bell美好+ish造成……,成……→进入美好→装饰
fam饿+ish造成……,成……→v.使饥饿
flour花+ish造成……,成……→v.繁荣,茂盛;挥舞
furb擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,刷新
im进入+pover贫困+ish造成……,成……→v.使成赤贫
pol擦亮+ish造成……,成……→v.磨光,擦亮;使优美,润饰 n.擦光剂,上光蜡
vanqu克服+ish造成……,成……→v.征服,击溃

means.word_mean: 脾气坏的;吝啬的,小气的

sentences.en: He would not offer a churlish roof to his visitors.
sentences.cn: 他十分小气，连住宿都不愿给来访者安排。

sentences.en: She offered them cups of tea and it seemed churlish to refuse.
sentences.cn: 她不停给他们倒茶，回绝的话又好像没礼貌。
